description: Phase 3: Break visual monotony with section accent colors, gradient page headers, differentiated empty states, and activation of existing animation utilities. IMPORTANT: Code is at ventus-voice/frontend/src/ (NOT root frontend/).

userStories.title: Define section accent CSS variables in both themes
userStories.description: As a developer, I need section-specific accent colors defined as CSS variables so each platform area has visual identity.
acceptanceCriteria: IMPORTANT: Code is at ventus-voice/frontend/src/ (NOT root frontend/)

Add to :root, .dark block in index.css: --accent-agents (blue/primary), --accent-analytics (warm amber), --accent-forge (purple), --accent-deploy (green), --accent-billing (gold), --accent-settings (neutral gray)
Add matching values to .light block with appropriate light-mode versions
Add a comment block above the variables explaining the section-to-color mapping
Values should be in HSL format without hsl() wrapper (matching existing pattern like --primary: 210 100% 80%)
Files: ventus-voice/frontend/src/index.css
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Added 6 section accent CSS variables (--accent-agents, --accent-analytics, --accent-forge, --accent-deploy, --accent-billing, --accent-settings) in HSL format to both :root/.dark and .light blocks in index.css. Included descriptive comment block mapping sections to colors. Typecheck passes.

userStories.title: Add hover-lift and card-hover animations to key surfaces

acceptanceCriteria: IMPORTANT: Code is at ventus-voice/frontend/src/ (NOT root frontend/)
Add hover-lift class to Dashboard stat cards (StatCard.tsx or equivalent)
Add card-hover class to agent cards on AgentsPage
Add neon-glow-hover class to primary CTA buttons on at least 3 key pages
All added animations use classes already defined in animations.css -- do NOT create new keyframes
Animations respect prefers-reduced-motion (already handled in animations.css)
No animation is distracting or causes layout shift
Files: ventus-voice/frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx, ventus-voice/frontend/src/pages/AgentsPage.tsx, key CTA buttons
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Added hover-lift class to Dashboard StatCard. Added card-hover class to AgentsPage agent cards (both grid and list views). Added neon-glow-hover to 3 primary CTA buttons: Dashboard create-agent, AgentsPage create-agent, and SubscriptionPage upgrade-plan. All classes pre-existing in animations.css, no new keyframes. prefers-reduced-motion already handled. Typecheck passes.
